summary: Build a simple laptop (2D) web browser-style app that loads external websites in an iframe, with basic navigation controls.
architectural_notes: Use an iframe-based approach to display external websites; some sites may block being embedded due to X-Frame-Options/CSP.

existing_features.title: Replace the current mod-menu/authenticated UI with a laptop-only (2D) web-browser-style interface that can load external websites inside an iframe, including a URL bar and basic navigation controls (Back, Forward, Reload, Go).
Ensure the app has no VR mode and does not show VR/Quest/APK/mod-menu UI elements; the experience must be laptop-only 2D.
Update the appâ€™s shell branding to match the laptop web browser experience (HTML title and PWA manifest name/description).
Apply a coherent visual theme suitable for a laptop web browser UI (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) and use it consistently across the browser page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement a laptop-only (2D) web browser UI with URL bar, back/forward buttons, and an iframe to load external websites

projectName: Laptop-only 2D web browser UI (URL bar + iframe navigation)
